hw7
Class HuffmanCoder

java.lang.Object
  hw7.HuffmanCoder

public class HuffmanCoder
extends java.lang.Object

Huffman coder class. Instantiates the HuffmanTree generic class using Character as the type parameter.

Constructor Summary
HuffmanCoder()
          Createa a new huffman tree with default (english) frequency distribution

Method Detail

createTreeFromFile

public void createTreeFromFile(java.lang.String fileName)
Creates a new Huffman tree of Characters, using the input text file to calculate character frequencies and setup the tree.

Parameters:
textFile - Used to calculate character frequencies.

encodeFile

public void encodeFile(java.lang.String fileName)
Encodes the file using the stored huffman tree. Stores the encryipted file with the name .huff

Parameters:
fileName - The file to be encoded.

decodeFile

public void decodeFile(java.lang.String fileName)
Decodes the file using the stored huffman tree. Writes the decoded file with the name .decoded

Parameters:
fileName - The file to be decoded.
